topics.body:
They see me rollin'
They hatin'
Splatoonin' they tryin to catch me rollin' squiddy
Tryin' to catch me rollin' squiddy
Tryin' to catch me rollin' squiddy
Tryin' to catch me rollin' squiddy
Tryin' to catch me rollin' squiddy
My roller's so loud
I'm squiddin'
They hopin' that they gon catch me rollin' squiddy
Tryin' to catch me rollin' squiddy
Tryin' to catch me rollin' squiddy
Tryin' to catch me rollin' squiddy
Tryin' to catch me rollin' squiddy

[Verse 1]
Snipers think they can see me lean
I'm squid so it ain't easy to be seen
When you see me ride by they can see the gleam
And my paint on the floor and the TV screen
Ride with a new squid, she like hold up
Next to the Wii U controller is a full tank and my roller
Turn a splatter into a coma
Squid you ain't know, I'm crazy like Iwata
Just tryin to roll ain't tryin to have no enemies
Paint clean itself so I pull in squiddies
Laws of rolling you know they hate me
Wailer turned all the way up until the maximum
I can speak for some squids tryin to shoot for some
But we packin somethin that we have and um will have a squid locked up in the maximum
Respawn point, I'm grippin roll
Wailer loud and dippin slow
Twist and turnin like hit this roll
Splattershots up from behind and is in his throat
Rollers down gotta stop commotion
Paint tanks change squidders like who is that producing?
This the Play-N-Skillz when we out and movin
Got turf wars in every city except Saltspray but I'm still ain't losin

--------------------

Might continue

topics.body:
So Doug Walker is being a horrible person

From Obscurus Lupa's tumblr:

Channel Awesome is running a “contest” for their latest DVD cover art. The winner gets $100, a link on the DVD case, something for their portfolio, and that always fantastic promise of “exposure.” Yes, portfolios, meaning they’re asking professional artists to make some art for free in the vain hope of having Channel Awesome make a profit off their work on their DVD. Keep in mind, only the winner gets paid.

Keep in mind, Doug mentions they’re looking for Drew Struzan style artwork, otherwise known as the painter guy who’s done all the iconic posters of your childhood (Star Wars, Harry Potter, Indiana Jones, etc). For the chance at $100 and exposure. Because lord knows if you’ve got that kind of talent you need Channel Awesome for exposure. 

Also they offer no reference photos, Doug just said “there’s pics of us on the internet, google it, lol”
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

Pretty much everyone knows he's a horrible person at this point.  What's worse is he begged his aunt and uncle for 50k to start up channel awesome saying that he would pay them back and he never did.

Oh Christ its one of those contests. I hate those.

"Hey guys! Do art for us and whoever wins gets money!"

"But what about the people that don't win but did equally and probably even more work for the contest?"

"FUCK EM"
